overview.heading: Lafayette Virtual Office
overview.body: Obtain a high-caliber Lafayette business address while avoiding the financial burden of a physical location. At Opus VO, you can situate your business within Lafayette’s lively commercial community, all while optimizing your budget. Have a crucial client meeting or a pitch that you can’t miss? Our luxurious conference rooms are crafted to exceed expectations.  When you go virtual in Lafayette through Opus VO, a specialized live receptionist is included in your offering. We go to great lengths to make every client interaction seamless, effectively becoming an extension of your brand’s own identity. Offload your everyday administrative tasks to us, liberating you to focus on your business goals.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Lafayette, Louisiana even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Lafayette. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Louisiana.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Lafayette virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Lafayette?
sections.body: Don’t underestimate Lafayette—it offers more than just southern charm. This city is an emerging hub for a range of industries, providing fertile ground for networking and business development. Establishing a virtual presence in Lafayette not only serves your budget but also enriches your business connections.  Choosing Opus VO in Lafayette is not just a wise financial decision—it’s a tactical advantage. Are you set to take your business to the next level? Our unparalleled virtual office services are ready to assist.  Opus VO, Lafayette @ 4400A Ambassador Caffery Pkwy, Lafayette, LA 70508
